alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 4:05PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SANTA CLARA COUNTY THROUGH 430 PM PST... At 405 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Morgan Hill, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Gilroy, Morgan Hill, and San Martin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains
